question:
In light of the recent plans to integrate the Astra missile system into India’s defence system, consider the following statements:
  1. It is an indigenously developed weapon system.
  2. It is an air to air missile.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Astra is an indigenously developed missile system. It was developed by the Defence Research and Development Organisation. It functions under all weather conditions and belongs to the ‘beyond visual range missiles’ category. Its production was commenced in 2017 and it has already been integrated into the Su-30MKI. Statement 2 is correct: The Astra weapon system features an air to air missile. It is the first such weapon to be developed by India. The weapon was in news over the Indian Air Force’s call to make the Astra its standard long range weapon for LCAs (light combat aircrafts).
